320029.「ジーくんは フーラズーラとの戦い方を\n みんなに教えるため この国に残ったん:
Jee stayed behind here to teach everyone how
to fight the Fluzula, right? I wonder how
that's going?

320032.「よし その調子だ ナーディラ。\n マルド！ 腕だけで 打とうとするな。\n:
Very good. Just like that, Nadira.
Mardo! Don't try to hit with just your arms.
Step in more firmly with your lower body!

320033.「おお <pc>隊長 ポルテ！\n ひさしぶりだな。:
Oh, <pc>! Porte!
Long time no see.

320034.「ナーディラ マルド！\n すまんが 少し 休憩にさせてくれ。:
Sorry, you two, but I need to take a short
break.

320036.「ジーくん師範 ひさしぶり！\n 戦い方の指導は うまく いってそうだねっ。:
It's been awhile, "Master" Jee!
It looks to me that your training is going
well.

320037.「いや そんなこともない。\n 他人に ものを教えることは むずかしい……。\n:
No, that's not exactly true... It's pretty
difficult to teach others. Every day, I'm
reminded of my own shortcomings.

320039.「あっ 王さま！\n イルシームさん！: Oh, Your Majesty! And Ilseem, too!

320040.「彼のおかげで フーラズーラと戦える者は\n 着実に 増えています。女性や老人が:
Thanks to him, the number of people able to fight the Fluzula has steadily risen. Even our women and our elderly have had success
in fending them off.

320041.「ああ。俺ひとりで 戦っていたころより\n 町の警備にも 余裕ができている。\n:
Yes. I'm now able to focus more on guarding
the town compared to when I had to fight by
my lonesome. That's all thanks to you, Jiganf.

320042.「しかし 参加希望者が多くてな……効率のいい\n 指導方法については リズク王の:
However, there were so many willing participants... I also sought some wisdom from King Rizk here on how to teach more
efficiently, such as grouping by skill level.

320043.「当の私は いまだに リスさんクラスで\n 体力作りを 続けているのですけどね。:
I'm still in the Squirrel Class, though.
I'm continuing to improve my fitness.

320044.「リズクは 昔から\n 運動が からきしだったからな……。\n ウサギさんクラス:
Rizk has never really been the athletic
type... It'll be awhile before he rises to
the Rabbit Class.

320045.「ところで 今日は\n メレチーの姿が 見えないな。\n 息災なのか？:
By the way...I noticed that Merry isn't
here with you. Is she faring well?

320046.「メレちーは ちょっと 別の用があるんだー。\n 来てないだけで 元気だよ！:
Merry has something else she's doing now.
She couldn't come here, but she's doing
just fine!

320047.「……って すっかり\n おしゃべりに 夢中になっちゃった！\n あたしたち 聞:
...Oh, I totally got sidetracked with all
this chatting! There's something we wanted
to ask you.

320048.<pc>は ジーガンフたちに\nアマラーク地方の 守護天使を\n捜しにきたと 話:
<pc> explains that they had come
looking for a Guardian Angel located in
the Amarak Region.

320049.「天使……？\n おとぎ話に出てくる 天使か？\n 白い翼が 生えているとかいう:
An angel...? Like the angels from fairy tales?
They say that they have giant, white wings.

320050.「私は 神も天使も 架空の存在……\n 人間の 空想の産物だと 思っていました。:
I thought gods and angels were just make
believe... a product of human imagination.
Are you telling me that they really exist...?

320051.「協力はしたいが 天使……天使か。\n どうにも 雲をつかむような話だな……。:
I'd love to help, but angels... angels, hm...
That just feels way too out of reach...

320052.「あの……みなさん\n 天使さまを 捜しているのですか？\n でしたら 私たち:
Um...are you all looking for an angel?
If so, we know where to find it.

320054.「ええ。\n どこにいるかも 知っています。: Yes, I know where they are.

320055.「びっくり……！\n でも これで 解決しちゃったね！:
What a surprise! I guess that settles it,
then!

320057.「うむ……どうも 腑に落ちんが 俺もリズクも\n 仕事の合間に 様子を見にきたも:
Indeed... Neither of us can really wrap our head around it. We just came to check on you while we took a break from work, so it's
about time we headed back. Pardon the interruption.

320059.「私たちのお願いを 聞いてくれたら\n お教えします！:
We'll tell you where it is if you listen to
our request!

320060.<center>ナーディラ……我を救いし少女に\nこの場所を 聞いたのか。いいだ:
Nadira... Did you learn of this place from
that girl who saved me? Very well...
I am the Guardian Angel of this land...

320062.「お前たちが ここへ向かったと聞き\n 見回りの合間に 様子を見にきたのだが……:
I heard you two were headed here, so I came to
check on you between my patrols. I was not
expecting to see a Fluzula here...

320063.「しかし 様子が おかしいな。\n 邪気を感じないし 何より……:
But there's something strange about its
behavior. I don't sense any evil, and not
to mention...

320065.「おお……！\n よもや 黒槍の遣い手とも\n 相まみえることになるとは。:
Oh...! I never expected I would meet the one
who wields the Black Spear.

320066.「我が名は バトラエル。\n 今は かように 忌まわしき姿をしているが\n この:
My name is Batrael. Although I have this
disgusting form, I am the Guardian Angel
of this place.

320067.「あっ えっと……あたしは ポルテだよ。\n この人は <pc>隊長で\n 黒槍:
Oh, um...my name is Porte.
This is <pc>, and the guy with
the Black Spear is Ilseem!

320068.「あたしと <pc>は\n マギエルさんに言われて\n 守護天使を 目覚めさせに:
<pc> and I came to wake the
Guardian Angel here at Magiel's request!

320069.「ウォルドの守護天使 マギエルに？\n では……そなたら ルティアナ神の子なのか:
Angelfall's Guardian Angel, Magiel? So...
You are children of Lutiana?! Wow...
I couldn't even sense that with this body!

320070.「ふむ……話が通じているようだし これが\n お前たちの捜していた 守護天使で良:
Hmm...looks like everyone's up to speed now. I suppose this is the Guardian Angel you're searching for? I have no idea what's going on
here, though.

320071.「しかし 天使よ。\n なぜ そのような姿に？:
But tell me, angel... How did you come to
look like that?

320072.「我は……元の身体を 奪われてしまったのだ。\n そなたらが フーラズーラと呼ぶ:
I...have been robbed of my original body.
Those monsters you call the Fluzula are
to blame...

320073.「それだけではない。\n このままだと やつらは 数日以内に\n アマラーク王国:
What's more...they plan on destroying Amarak
Kingdom in but a few days.

320074.「なんだと！？\n いったい どういうことだ！:
What did you say?! Just what are they
planning?

320075.「これまで フーラズーラは\n 人を食うことで 命をつないできた。\n アマラー:
Until now, the Fluzula have sustained their lives by eating people, even long before the rise of Amarak. For tens of thousands of
years...

320076.「しかし ここ２０年ほどは\n 食える数が 激減し……最近に いたっては\n 黒:
However, in the last 20 years or so, the amount of food available for them has dwindled dramatically... And recently,
even humans who do not wield a Black Spear can repel them.

320077.「２０年っていうのは イルシームさんが\n 黒槍を 持つようになった時期で……\:
That 20 years is when Ilseem started using the
Black Spear...and the most recent thing is
due to Jee's leadership.

320078.「そのとおり。よろこばしいことだが これが\n フーラズーラに 危機感を 抱かせ:
Exactly right. This bodes well, but it has
backed the Fluzula into a corner. Soon,
they will launch a coordinated assault.

320079.「それって この前みたいに\n アマラークが 襲われるってこと！？\n 絶対ダメ:
Does this mean they're going to attack Amarak
like the last time?! We can't let them! We
have to do something...!

320080.「しかし フーラズーラは いくらでも\n わいて出る。たとえ 民が総出で戦ったと:
But the Fluzula always come back without
end. Even if all our people fight together, it
will be difficult to repel them...

320081.「うむ。付け加えると 先日の襲撃を\n はるかに 上回る規模の 戦いになる。\n:
Yes. I will also add that this will be a much
bigger battle than that last attack. Going
head-on doesn't stand a chance.

320082.「狙うべきは やつらの本体だ。: Their main body is what we should aim for.

320083.「じつは ハディン採石場の地下には さらに\n 洞くつが 広がっており……その最:
In fact, there lies another cave beneath the
Hadine Quarry where the Fluzula's main
body lurks.

320084.「アマラークに出現する 無数のフーラズーラは\n 本体が 生み出している。\n:
The countless Fluzula that appear in Amarak
spawn from this main body. Defeating it
should stop them from appearing.

320085.「かつて 本体に\n 戦いを挑んだ 我は……身体を食われ\n 天使のチカラごと:
When I had challenged the main body to battle,
my body...it was devoured and it absorbed
my angelic powers.

320086.「先日 アマラークを襲撃した\n 巨大なフーラズーラを 覚えているか？\n あれ:
Remember the giant Fluzula that attacked
Amarak last time? That was me.

320087.「えっ そーなの！？\n あたし あいつを やっつけてって\n <pc>に お願:
What? Seriously?!
I had asked <pc> to take you
down!

320088.「いや それで正しかった。おかげで\n 邪悪なチカラが削がれ 核……天使である\:
No, that was necessary. Thanks to that, its evil power was weakened, leaving only its core behind...my consciousness. That is
this form.

320089.「ようやく 自分の意思で 動けるようになり\n 人々と 接触を試みたのだが……\:
When I was finally able to move on my own, I tried to make contact...but I was chased out and ended up being protected by that girl.
Bringing us to now.

320090.「それは 申し訳なかった。\n 民に代わって 詫びさせてほしい。:
For that, I apologize, on behalf of our
people.

320091.「いや……この姿だからな。仕方あるまい。\n しかし フーラズーラの本体を 倒さ:
No need to worry...that's just how it is in this form. But, we must defeat the Fluzula's main body, lest my angelic form
and power be restored.

320092.「ルティアナ神の子らよ。守護天使としての我を\n 取りもどすため……何より アマ:
Children of Lutiana... To regain my form as a Guardian Angel, and to above all protect the people of Amarak... Please, you must
defeat the main body.

320093.「もちろんだよ！ あたし……は\n あんまり 役に立たないかもしれないけど。\n:
Of course! I...probably won't be of much use
to you. But <pc> here is really
strong!

320094.「国を挙げての 作戦になる。\n リズクと相談するため\n アマラークに戻るぞ:
This operation involves the entire country.
Let us return to Amarak and consult with
Rizk.

320095.「あなたも 一緒に来てほしいけど\n また 騒ぎになっちゃうかも……そうだ！\n:
I wish you could come with us, too, but it
might cause a scene... Hey, I know!
You can hide inside my hood, Traeie!

320096.「これは ありがたい。\n では 失礼し…………トラちゃん？:
Thank you for this.
Please excuse me...
...Traeie?

320097.「名前 バトラエルでしょ？\n だから トラちゃん。:
Your name's Batrael, right?
So, Traeie!

320098.「俺は 先に戻って リズクに話しておく。\n お前たちも 玉座の間に 来てくれ\:
I'll head back and speak with Rizk first.
<pc>, Porte, Traeie... Please join
me in the throne room.

320100.フーラズーラ討伐作戦の 決行前夜\n国王リズクからの 激励のために\n玉座の間へ:
On the night before the Fluzula eradication
mission, soldiers gather in the throne room
for a final pep talk from King Rizk.

320101.「……アマラークにとって この２００年は\n 受難の時だった。あまたの戦士たちが:
...For Amarak, the last 200 years have been
an age of suffering. Many of our warriors
were helplessly devoured by the Fluzula.

320102.「しかし 彼らが\n あの化け物との戦い方を 授けてくれた。\n 今こそ 反撃の:
But our friends here have given us a way
to fight these monsters. Now is the time
for us to fight back!

320103.「……地下洞くつに潜む フーラズーラの本体。\n これを倒せば やつらは 二度と:
The Fluzula's main body lurks in a cave
underground. Once it is defeated, they
will cease to appear ever again.

320104.「討伐作戦は 明朝 開始とする。\n そなたら 戦士たちの\n 勇敢な働きに 期:
This operation will begin tomorrow morning.
I look forward to seeing everyone's valiant
efforts.

320108.「はりきりもする。\n 黒槍に頼らず 自らの手で\n 雪辱を果たせる日が きたの:
I'm excited as well. The day has finally
come where I can exact revenge on my
own, without relying on the Black Spear.

320109.「それは オレにとっても 同じこと。\n 強敵との出会いを求め この国に来たのに:
It's the same for me, too. I came to this
country looking for a chance to fight a strong
opponent, but it was just out of my reach...

320110.「地下洞くつに 乗り込み\n 本体を ぶちのめすことで\n 晴らさせてもらおう！:
Let's give a good beating to that monster
underground and make it go away forever!

320111.「まさか 俺たちの代で\n フーラズーラを 倒せるとは……。:
To think we'd be able to beat the Fluzula
while we still lived...

320112.「この作戦に 参加できるなんて 最高の栄誉だ！\n 俺は よろこんで この命を捧:
It is the greatest honor to be a part of this
mission! I will gladly give my life!
Death does not scare me!

320113.「ああ！\n 戦いの中で死ねるなら 本望だ！:
Yeah! If I'm to die in battle, then I'll die
happy!

320114.「誇り高き 戦いを！ 名誉ある死を！\n それが アマラークの戦士というもの！:
Fight with pride! Die with honor! That is
what it means to be a warrior of Amarak!

320115.「な なんか……\n イヤな方向に はりきってない？:
H..hey...
Aren't you getting a little too excited
about the wrong thing?

320116.「以前 リズク王が言っていたな……\n 一般の兵士たちは 死こそが 誇りだと\n:
King Rizk once told me... The common soldier
thinks that there is pride in death.
...I can't say that I like that.

320119.「ジーガンフ殿が お前たちに\n 戦い方を教えたのは 死なせるためではない！\n:
Sir Jiganf did not teach you to fight, only
for you to die! It was to keep you alive!

320120.「ガンナーム！\n お前は 老いた両親に代わって\n 家業を継ぎたいのだろう！？:
Gannam! Do you not wish to inherit the
family business from your aging parents?!

320121.「おっ 俺の名を……両親のことまで！？:
Oh! You called me by name...and even my
parents, too?!

320122.「スハイル！\n もうすぐ 子が産まれるのだろう。\n お前は 我が子を抱かぬま:
Suhairu! Soon, your child will be born.
Do you really intend to die without
feeling its warmth in your arms?!

320124.「たしかに これまで 私は\n お前たちに 死ぬことを 強いてきた。\n だが:
Indeed, it is true that up until now, I have
ordered you to face death. But this time
is different!

320125.「死ぬために 戦うな。\n 自分のため……家族のため……愛する者のため。\n 生:
Do not fight only to die. Fight for your
yourself...your family, your loved ones...
You must fight to live.

320126.「……どうだ ダウワース。\n お前は 死ぬために 戦いたいか？:
...What about you, Dauwaas?
Do you wish to die fighting?

320128.「……許されるのでしょうか。\n 誇り高きアマラーク兵が 死にたくないなど……\:
Is this acceptable? That a proud Amarak
soldier would not want to die...? Not
wanting to see his comrades die, either...?

320129.「アマラークが王 リズクが許す！\n そして 命じる。我らが 怨敵と戦い\n 生:
I, Rizk, king of Amarak, shall allow it!
Thus, I command you: we will fight our worst
enemy and live on to achieve victory!

320132.「すごい……！\n さっきと 熱が 段違い！:
Amazing...!
The vibe is so much different than before!

320133.「ああ。\n この士気ならば おそらく……！:
Yeah. With this kind of morale, then
just maybe...!

320136.「ああ……こんなところに いたのですね。\n 捜してくださって ありがとうござい:
Ah...there he is. Thank you for looking for
him, <pc>.

320137.「珍しいですね。\n あなたが そんなふうに 考え事なんて。:
For you so lost in your own thoughts...
That's not like you.

320138.「先ほどの お前を見て 感慨深くなってな。\n ……あの 泣き虫ぼうずが\n 立:
I was pretty moved from what I just saw.
That whiny little brat has become such a
great king...

320139.<center>お母さま……お母さまが！\n僕を かばって……フーラズーラにぃっ:
Mother... Mother...!
She protected me...from the Fluzula!

320140.「そう言う あなたは\n 自分の幸せを 捨てることを選んだ。\n 私と 民を守る:
So you say.
You chose to forsake your own happiness,
so you could protect me and my people.

320141.「毎日の見回りのために 大好きな風呂にも\n ろくに浸かれない。私が成人した日も:
You couldn't even soak in your beloved bath because of your daily rounds. And even on the day I came of age, it was mere water
that filled your cup...

320142.「そうだ！ 作戦が成功したら\n 秘蔵のワインを 開けますよ。\n それで 乾杯:
I got it! If the mission succeeds, then I'll
open a bottle of my treasured wine.
We can have a toast!

320143.「酒か……もう ２０年ほど 飲んでないな。:
Alcohol, huh... I haven't had a drink in about
20 years.

320144.「それに あなたが 役目から解放されたとなれば\n 国中の女が 放っておかないで:
And besides...if you were relieved of your duty, I'm sure that the women here wouldn't leave you alone. I'd feel much safer if you
had someone to call your wife.

320145.「お前が それを言うな！\n いつまでも 遊び歩いて まったく……\n なぜか:
Don't you start with that! You're always
just gallivanting around... And for some
reason, the complaints always come to me.

320146.「あっはっは！\n それほど この国の女たちが\n 魅力的だということですよ。:
Ahaha! That's just how beautiful the women in
this country are.

320147.「ふふ……今から 楽しみで 仕方ありません。\n あなたには 幸せになってもらわ:
Heh heh...I just can't help but get excited
for it. I have to make you happy!

320149.<center>イルシームの野郎\n最近 付き合い 悪いよな。\n今日も居残って:
That bastard Ilseem... His attitude lately
has been pretty bad, huh? He's making
us stay late again for training today!

320150.<center>ああ……酒も 断ったらしい。\nお偉方への真面目アピールだか 知:
Yeah...heard he also turned down drinking.
I don't know if its some ploy to kiss up to
the higher ups or what, but it's annoying...

320151.<center>ほかの男と 幸せになれ……？\nなんて ひどい人！\n私は あな:
You want me to be happy with another man...?
You're awful! I want to be happy with you!

320153.<center>イルシーム！\nお母さまが 子馬を くださったんだ。\n乗り方を:
Ilseem! Mother gave me a pony!
Please show me how to ride it!

320155.「……<pc>さん！\n 明日は どうか……どうか\n イルシームを 頼みますね:
<pc>! Tomorrow, please...
Please lend Ilseem your strength!

320156.「そうだな。頼りにしているぞ <pc>。\n さて……明日の 勝利のためにも\n:
That's right. I'll be counting on you,
<pc>. Now, then...it's about time
we got some rest for tomorrow's victory.

320157.<pc>は ポルテとジーガンフと共に\nアマラーク城の 客間に戻り 眠りについた:
<pc>, along with Porte and Jiganf,
return to the guest room inside the
castle and fall soundly asleep.

320159.「王さま！ イルシームさん！\n この 鐘の音は？\n いったい 何が 起こって:
Your Majesty! Illseem! What is that ringing
noise? Has something happened?!

320160.「……フーラズーラの大群が 攻めてきました。\n 作戦決行の前に……町は 大混乱:
A horde of Fluzula has invaded...
Before we were able to begin our mission,
the town is now in chaos...

320161.「それは……決行前で 良かったとも言えるな。\n 兵士の出発後では 訓練を受けた:
Well...it's a good thing it happened before. If the soldiers had been gone, then it would have been impossible for the people here
to endure alone, despite their training.

320162.「でも どうするの？\n 兵士さんたちも一緒に 地下洞くつへ行って\n 本体を倒:
But what should we do? The plan was for the
soldiers to go underground with us to fight
the main body, right?

320163.「……作戦を 変更しましょう。\n 兵士たちは 防衛のため 町に残します。:
...Let's change the plan. I will have the
soldiers remain here as a line of defense.

320164.「地下洞くつへは <pc>さん\n ジーガンフさんに イルシーム……\n 少数精:
<pc>, Jiganf, and Ilseem...
You three will head underground as an
elite team.

320165.「悪いが オレは 行けない。\n ……町を守るために 残る。:
Sorry, but I can't. I'm staying behind to
help protect the town.

320166.「えっ！？\n で でも ジーくんって……\n 強敵と戦うために 調査隊に入った:
What?! B...but Jee... Didn't you join our
exploration team to fight strong enemies?

320167.「最初はな。だが オレは この国で\n 戦いの指導を 続けてきた。\n ……弟子:
At first I did. But I've been leading the
battles of this country. I will not leave
my students behind.

320168.「オレは ここで 皆と共に戦うぞ！\n 本体を倒す役目は <pc>\n イルシー:
I'm going to stay here and fight alongside you
all! <pc>, Ilseem... I leave the task
of defeating the main body to you!

320172.「承知。\n まずは ハディン採石場の 最深部へ！:
Of course. First, make your way to the depths
of the Hadine Quarry!

320174.<pc>とポルテ そして\nイルシームは 大混乱に おちいる\nアマラーク王国か:
<pc>, Porte and Ilseem manage to
escape the chaos that's befallen the
Amarak Kingdom...

320175.「やったあ！\n カメさんの おかげで 湖を渡れるね！:
Yesss! Thanks to the turtle, we can cross the
lake now!

320176.「あれは カメではなく ガメゴンだ。: That's not a turtle. It's a Wyrtle.

320177.「カメさんの背中に乗って……か。\n まるで おとぎ話だな。:
Riding on the back of a turtle...
It's straight out of a fairy tale.

320178.「あれは カメではなく ガメゴンだ。\n ……ともかく これで 本体のもとへ行け:
It's not a turtle, it's a Wyrtle!
...Anyways, that should take us to the
main body.

320179.「急ごう。\n 今も ジーガンフと兵たちは\n 戦っているはずだ。:
We should hurry. Jiganf and the soldiers
are likely fighting even now.

320180.「うわわっ いきなり 何！？\n これ……どう見ても\n あたしたちを 狙いにき:
Waahh! Out of nowhere?!
They're...they're clearly after us, aren't
they?

320181.「先ほど フーラズーラを倒したことで\n 我らの侵入に 気付いたのか……！\n:
They must've noticed our intrusion after
we defeated those Fluzula from before...
There's just no end in sight!

320182.「じゃあ 相手にしないで 逃げようよ。\n 急いで 本体のとこに 向かおう！:
Then let's just ignore it and get outta
here! We need to hurry and get to the
main body!

320183.「無理だな……湖がある。\n 渡っている最中に 囲まれたら 全滅だ。:
That's impossible...there's the lake. If we're
ambushed while trying to cross, we're
done for.

320186.「俺は ここに残り こいつらを引きつける。\n その間に お前たちは 先へ進め！:
I'll stay here and hold their attention.
You all need to press on!

320187.「そんな！ いくら イルシームさんでも\n ひとりで戦いつづけるなんて ムチャだ:
No way! It doesn't matter how capable you
are, it's too reckless to keep fighting alone!

320188.「……<pc>さん！\n 明日は どうか……どうか\n イルシームを 頼みますね:
<pc>! Tomorrow, please...
Please lend Ilseem your strength!

320189.「お前たちが 本体を倒してくれれば\n こいつらは消え 俺も助かる。\n さあ:
If you're able to take down the main body,
then they'll all disappear and I'll be fine.
Now hurry up and go!

320192.「お前が頼りだ <pc>。\n どうか アマラークに 勝利を！\n<select:
You're our only hope, <pc>!
You must bring victory to Amarak!
<select_nc>
Leave it to me!
I'll see you later!
Don't die!
<select_end>

320193.「……お前に会えて よかった。: ...I'm glad I was able to meet you.

320196.「さあ 地底湖へ行くぞ！\n ガメゴンの背に乗って 本体を倒すのだ！:
We must hurry to the lake! We'll ride the
Wyrtle to the other side and take down
that main body!

320200.<center>この子は リズク。\nこの国の 王となる子。\n私の宝……。:
This is Rizk, the king of this country.
My treasure...

320201.<center>イルシーム。\nどうか この子の 良き兄に……。: Ilseem. Please...be a good brother to him...

320202.<center>イルシーム！\nお勉強 おわったよ。遊んでー！: Ilseem! I've finished my studies! Let's play!

320203.<center>うわあああん！\n剣術なんか できなくていいもん！\nぼくには:
Uwaaah!! I don't need to be good at swords!
That's what you're here for, Ilseem!

320205.「イルシーム これ！\n これ あげるから 食べて。\n お母さまに いただいた:
Here, Ilseem! Eat it, it's for you!
It's a pretty special sweet Mother gave to me!

320206.「菓子ぃ？\n そんなもの 子供じゃあるまいし……。:
Sweets?
You're not a little child anymore...

320212.「心持たざる 幽鬼ども！\n 貴様らに 人の営みの 何がわかる！:
You heartless ghosts! What could you possibly
know of human life?!

320213.「何千 何万こようが 同じこと。\n 貴様らごときに\n 俺を止めることなど で:
No matter how many thousands of you come,
it's all the same. Know that you cannot stop
me!

320214.「アマラークが槍 イルシーム！\n 推して参る！:
I am Ilseem, the spear of Amarak!
I will charge forth!

320216.「あれこそが 我らの倒すべき敵……\n フーラズーラの本体だ。:
That is our enemy that we must defeat...
The main body of the Fluzula.

320217.「ええーっ！？\n なんか 思ってたのと違う！\n ホントに これが 本体？:
Whaaat?! It's not what I expected at all!
Is this really the main body?

320218.「やつの正体は……はるか昔\n この世界を襲った ジア・クト念晶体の１体。\n:
This creature's true identity...it is one of the Dia Kut Telecrystal that attacked this world many years ago. Its name is Dia
Garne.

320219.「やつの身体は 我が ここに封じていたが\n フーラズーラが 創り出されるのは\:
I sealed his body here, but I was not able
to prevent the creation of the Fluzula...

320220.「<cs_pchero>。\n 我が やつを抑えているうちに 倒してくれ。\n:
<cs_pchero>! Please take him down
while I hold him back. Then the Fluzula
will...

320221.<center>つれないな バトラエル。\n幾万年を 共に過ごした仲だろう。\n:
How heartless of you, Batrael.
We've spent thousands of years
together. In the same body, no less...

320224.「……ジア・ガルネ！\n 貴様 なぜ 動ける！？: Dia Garne! How is it that you can move?!

320225.「とうの昔に 可能だった。\n お前の拘束を 打ち破ることなど。\n ……人間を:
It was possible long ago. To break from your
shackles. ...With the power of creation
gained from devouring humans.

320226.「それならば……なぜ そうしなかったのだ。\n ここに留まり 化け物を 創りつづ:
If so, then...why didn't you? You had no need
to stay here and continue to create more
and more monsters...

320227.「ふ…ふ…ふ。\n わからんのか？ バトラエル。\n では 教えてやろう。:
Heh, heh, heh...
Don't you understand, Batrael?
Well, I'll tell you.

320228.「……美味だったからさ！\n 化け物に 人間を食わせるたびに響く\n お前の絶叫:
...Because it was DELICIOUS! The screams of
those who were devoured... Echoed more
loudly than anything else!

320230.「ピカピカマン！ よくも……\n よくも たくさんの人を 死なせたうえに\n ト:
Hey, Shiny Man! How dare you...
How dare you let so many people die, and
do such horrible things to Traeie!

320231.「ふ！ ふ！ ふ！ 食ってやろう お前らも！\n そして 味わおう。\n バトラ:
Heh! Heh! Heh! You too, will be eaten! Then,
I will taste it. The delicious screams that
Batrael will muster!

320232.「ふ！ ふふ！ ふふふふふふ！\n 破壊するか この俺を。この念晶体を……！:
Heh... Heh, heh! Heh heh heh heh heh!
Destroy me, will you? This telecrystal...!

320235.「我が名は バトラエル。\n この地の 守護天使なり。:
My name is Batrael. I am the Guardian Angel
of this land.

320236.「ありがとう ルティアナ神の子 <cs_pchero>。\n そなたのおかげで:
<cs_pchero>, child of Lutiana...thank you.
It's because of you I was able to regain my
true form.

320237.「やはり お前がやってくれたのだな……\n <cs_pchero>。: I knew that you could do it, <cs_pchero>...

320239.「お…俺を 取り囲んでいた フーラズーラが\n 急に消えてな。もう少し遅ければ:
T...the Fluzula that had me surrounded suddenly disappeared... If just a moment later, it might have taken a turn for the
worse... Thank you...

320241.「我は 守護天使 バトラエル。\n そなたの持つ 黒き槍は……\n 元来 我の所:
I am Batrael, Guardian Angel.
That black spear you carry...it originally
belonged to myself.

320242.「ジア・クトどもの襲撃時\n 主神グランゼニスより賜った 武器。\n それが 黒:
It is the weapon that Gran Zenith had
entrusted to me when the Dia Kut attacked...
The Black Spear... No, the Divine Spear.

320243.「この地を襲った ジア・ガルネと 我の戦いは\n 長きにわたり 決着がつかぬまま:
After a long and dragged out battle against
Dia Garne... Gran Zenith decided his last
resort.

320244.「創生のチカラを奪う 大いなる呪い……創失。\n ジア・クトを消し去るための 諸:
A great curse that robs the power of
creation...unmaking. That double-edged
sword also affected this land.

320245.「我は とっさに\n 神槍を投げ放ち 結界を張った。\n 創失から この地を 守:
Quickly, I threw my spear and erected a ward
to protect this land from being unmade.

320246.「しかし……その隙を 突いて\n ジア・ガルネは 我を…………:
However...Dia Garne used this as an
opportunity to strike...

320247.「本来 ジア・クトどもに 捕食という概念は\n ないはずだが……創失に侵された:
The concept of eating prey should not have been understood by the Dia Kut... But Garne, affected by the unmaking, may have devoured
me instinctively.

320248.「主神より生み出された 天使たる我は\n 強い創生のチカラを 宿していたからな。:
As an angel born of the Almighty, I was
imbued with a very strong power of creation.
It was almost like an instinct to survive...

320249.「これで わかったよ……。\n アマラーク王国の 創生のチカラが濃いのは\n ト:
Now I get it... Amarak Kingdom's strong power
of creation is because Traeie protected it.

320250.「…………いいや。\n 我は……守れなかった。:
No, I couldn't...
I couldn't protect it.

320251.「ジア・ガルネに吸収された 我は\n 逆に それを利用して やつの身体をあやつり:
Dia Garne absorbed my being. I used this to
my advantage to manipulate his body, and
seal him in this cavern.

320252.「やつは 創失の呪いに 侵されていた。\n その身体は 徐々に 創生のチカラを失:
Tainted by the curse of unmaking, his body
gradually lost the power of creation.
Eventually, it would just vanish...

320253.「しかし ジア・ガルネは 我を食うことで\n 生命を創り出す 手段……\n 創生:
But by devouring me, Dia Garne gained
the means to create life...
The ability of creation!

320254.「創失で 消えるはずだった やつは……\n 化け物を創り 人間を食うことで\n:
He should've disappeared by unmaking... But by creating monsters that devoured humans, he fed on the power of creation
and continued to live...

320255.「……わかるか？\n 守護天使たる 我のチカラこそが！\n フーラズーラという災:
...Don't you understand? It was my power
as Guardian Angel that created the disaster
that was the Fluzula!

320257.「……正直なところ 俺には\n お前の話のすべてを 理解できん。\n だが これ:
...To be frank, I don't quite understand
everything you're saying. But there is
one thing I do understand.

320258.「バトラエル……お前が この地を\n 呪いから守っていなければ アマラークも\n:
Batrael...if you had not protected this land
from that curse, neither Amarak or its people
would be here today. So, I thank you for that.

320260.「この数万年 いっそ 殺してくれと\n 願わない日は なかったが……\n <cs:
For tens of thousands of years, there hasn't been a single day where I didn't wish that someone would just put an end to me...
But ...you saved me.

320261.「そなたは ウォルドの守護天使\n マギエルの指示で 我を捜していたのだったな。:
You were searching for me under the guidance
of Angelfall's Guardian Angel Magiel, correct?
Then, here. Please accept this.

320263.「マギエルから あずかっていたものだ。\n それでは……時が来たら 我を呼ぶとい:
Magiel entrusted this to me. So...when the
time comes, please call for me. I will surely
come to your aid...

320264.「よかったな <cs_pchero>。\n ……アマラークは 無事だろうか。\n:
You've done well, <cs_pchero>.
I wonder how Amarak is faring.
We should hurry back.

320267.「<pc>！ ポルテ！\n 本体を 倒してくれたんだな。:
<pc>, Porte!
So you took down the main body!

320268.「うんっ <pc>がね！\n アマラークは どう？\n みんな 無事！？:
Yeah, <pc> did!
How is Amarak? Is everyone okay?!

320269.「ああ。きびしい戦いだったが\n 皆 耐えてくれた。\n 負傷者は多いが 犠牲者:
Yeah. It was a pretty tough fight, but we all
managed to hold our own. Many were
wounded, but there were no casualties.

320271.「わ 私は きっと……\n あなたは……生きて戻らぬのだろうと…………:
I...I thought for sure...
That you...would not come back alive...

320272.「なんだ。\n 戻れと言ったのは お前だろう。:
What's that for? You're the one who told me
to come back.

320275.「やはり 俺は……\n 酒よりも 菓子のほうがいい。:
You know, I'd rather...eat some sweets instead
of drinking.

320277.「<pc>さん……\n 心から お礼を申し上げます。\n この国を 救ってくださ:
<pc>...
From the depths of my heart...I want to
thank you for saving this country.

320278.「イルシームを……\n 兄を 連れ帰ってくださったこと。\n 本当に ありがとう:
For bringing Ilseem...for bringing my brother
back home.
Thank you...thank you so much.

320279.「この大恩に報いるほどの 品など\n 用意できそうにないのですが……\n せめて:
I don't think there's anything I can offer to
repay this enormous debt of gratitude, but
I hope you can at least accept this.

320280.「今宵は 国を挙げての 宴を開きます。\n ぜひ <pc>さんも ご参加ください:
Tonight, I will host a banquet for all to
join. Please, <pc>, do join us!

320281.フーラズーラという長年の脅威から 解放された\nアマラーク王国の人々は 皆\n晴:
The people of Amarak Kingdom, finally freed from the seemingly unending threat of the Fluzula, all wore bright smiles on their
faces.

320282.<pc>はポルテと ジーガンフと共に\n宴に参加し 楽しい時を過ごした……。\n:
<pc>, along with Porte and Jiganf,
attended the banquet. They all had a
wonderful time...

320283.盛大な宴が お開きになると <pc>たちは\nアマラーク城で 身体を休めた。\n:
When the grand feast came to a close,
<pc> and co. rested themselves
inside Amarak Castle.

320285.残りの守護天使を 目覚めさせるため\nほかの町へ 向かおう。\n:
Head to another town to awaken the remaining
Guardian Angels.

320286.これで ３人の守護天使を 目覚めさせた。\nはじまりの地へ 戻ろう。\n:
Now that the three Guardian Angels have been
awakened, head back to the Land of
Beginnings.

328308.「やったあ！\n カメさんの おかげで 湖を渡れるね！:
Yesss! Thanks to the turtle, we can cross the
lake now!

328309.「あれは カメではなく ガメゴンだ。: That's not a turtle. It's a Wyrtle.

328310.「カメさんの背中に乗って……か。\n まるで おとぎ話だな。:
Riding on the back of a turtle...
It's straight out of a fairy tale.

328311.「あれは カメではなく ガメゴンだ。\n ……ともかく これで 本体のもとへ行け:
It's not a turtle, it's a Wyrtle!
...Anyways, that should take us to the
main body.

328312.「急ごう。\n 今も ジーガンフと兵たちは\n 戦っているはずだ。:
We should hurry. Jiganf and the soldiers
are likely fighting even now.

328313.「うわわっ いきなり 何！？\n これ……どう見ても\n あたしたちを 狙いにき:
Waahh! Out of nowhere?!
They're...they're clearly after us, aren't
they?

328314.「先ほど フーラズーラを倒したことで\n 我らの侵入に 気付いたのか……！\n:
They must've noticed our intrusion after
we defeated those Fluzula from before...
There's just no end in sight!

328315.「じゃあ 相手にしないで 逃げようよ。\n 急いで 本体のとこに 向かおう！:
Then let's just ignore it and get outta
here! We need to hurry and get to the
main body!

328316.「無理だな……湖がある。\n 渡っている最中に 囲まれたら 全滅だ。:
That's impossible...there's the lake. If we're

done for.

328319.「俺は ここに残り こいつらを引きつける。\n その間に お前たちは 先へ進め！:
I'll stay here and hold their attention.
You all need to press on!

328320.「そんな！ いくら イルシームさんでも\n ひとりで戦いつづけるなんて ムチャだ:
No way! It doesn't matter how capable you

328321.「……<pc>さん！\n 明日は どうか……どうか\n イルシームを 頼みますね:
<pc>! Tomorrow, please...
Please lend Ilseem your strength!

328322.「お前たちが 本体を倒してくれれば\n こいつらは消え 俺も助かる。\n さあ:
If you're able to take down the main body,
then they'll all disappear and I'll be fine.
Now hurry up and go!
